Annotation.String: The `PowerSupplyMetrics` schema contains definitions for the metrics of a power supply.
This resource shall be used to represent the metrics of a power supply unit for a Redfish implementation.
This action resets the summary metrics related to this equipment.
This action shall reset any time intervals or counted values for this equipment.
The status and health of the resource and its subordinate or dependent resources.
This property shall contain any status or health properties of the resource.
The input voltage (V) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the input voltage, in volt units, for this power supply. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`.
The input current (A) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the input current, in ampere units, for this power supply. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Current`.
The input power (W) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the input power, in watt units, for this power supply. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`.
The energy consumption (kWh) of this unit.

This property shall contain the total energy, in kilowatt-hour units, for this unit that represents the `Total` `ElectricalContext` sensor when multiple energy sensors exist. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`.
The frequency (Hz) for this power supply.
This property shall contain the frequency, in hertz units, for this power supply.
The total power output (W) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the total output power, in watt units, for this power supply. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`.
The output voltages (V) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the output voltages, in volt units, for this power supply. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`. The sensors shall appear in the same array order as the `OutputRails` property in the associated `PowerSupply` resource.
The output currents (A) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the output currents, in ampere units, for this power supply. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Current`. The sensors shall appear in the same array order as the `OutputRails` property in the associated `PowerSupply` resource.
The output power readings (W) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the output power readings, in watt units, for this power supply. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`. The sensors shall appear in the same array order as the `OutputRails` property in the associated `PowerSupply` resource.
The temperature (C) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the temperature, in degree Celsius units, for this resource. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Temperature`.
The fan speed (percent) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the fan speed, in percent units, for this resource. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Percent`.

PropertyValue.String: This property has been deprecated in favor of `FanSpeedsPercent` to support multiple fans within a power supply.

Annotation.String: The available actions for this resource.
This property shall contain the available actions for this resource.
The available actions for this resource.
This type shall contain the available actions for this resource.
The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
This property shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
The available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
This type shall contain the available OEM-specific actions for this resource.
This version was created to update descriptions to tie excerpt property definitions to a specific type of `Sensor` or `Control` resource. It was also created to remove unused object definitions.
This version was created to correct various typographical errors.
This version was created to force the regeneration of OpenAPI schemas to properly express nullable properties with external references. It was also created to correct various typographical errors.
This version was created to deprecate `FanSpeedPercent` in favor of `FanSpeedsPercent`.
Fan speeds (percent).

This property shall contain the fan speeds, in percent units, for this resource. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Percent`.
This version was created to correct various typographical errors.
This version was created to force the regeneration of OpenAPI schemas to properly express nullable properties with external references. It was also created to correct various typographical errors.
This version was created to add endpoints for triphase PSU input monitoring.
The input polyphase voltage readings for this power supply.
This property shall contain the input polyphase voltage sensors for this power supply.
The input polyphase current readings for this power supply.
This property shall contain the input polyphase current sensors for this power supply.
The input polyphase power readings for this power supply.
This property shall contain the input polyphase power sensors for this power supply.
The input polyphase energy consumption readings for this power supply.
This property shall contain the input polyphase energy sensors for this power supply.
The voltage sensors for this power supply.
This type shall contain properties that describe voltage sensor readings for a power supply.
The Line 1 to Line 2 voltage (V) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the line-to-line voltage, in volt units, between L1 and L2. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1-L2 measurement.
The Line 2 to Line 3 voltage (V) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the line-to-line voltage, in volt units, between L2 and L3. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2-L3 measurement.
The Line 3 to Line 1 voltage (V) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the line-to-line voltage, in volt units, between L3 and L1. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3-L1 measurement.
The Line 1 to Neutral voltage (V) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the line-to-line voltage, in volt units, between L1 and Neutral. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1-Neutral measurement.
The Line 2 to Neutral voltage (V) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the line-to-line voltage, in volt units, between L2 and Neutral. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2-Neutral measurement.
The Line 3 to Neutral voltage (V) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the line-to-line voltage, in volt units, between L3 and Neutral. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Voltage`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3-Neutral measurement.
The current sensors for this power supply.
This type shall contain properties that describe current sensor readings for a power supply.
Line 1 current (A).

This property shall contain the line current, in ampere units, for L1. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Current`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1 measurement.
Line 2 current (A).

This property shall contain the line current, in ampere units, for L2. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Current`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2 measurement.
Line 3 current (A).

This property shall contain the line current, in ampere units, for L3. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Current`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3 measurement.
Neutral line current (A).

This property shall contain the line current, in ampere units, for the Neutral line. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Current`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include a Neutral line measurement.
The power sensors for this power supply.
This type shall contain properties that describe power sensor readings for a power supply.
The Line 1 to Line 2 power (W) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the power, in watt units, between L1 and L2. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1-L2 measurement.
The Line 2 to Line 3 power (W) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the power, in watt units, between L2 and L3. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2-L3 measurement.
The Line 3 to Line 1 power (W) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the power, in watt units, between L3 and L1. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3-L1 measurement.
The Line 1 to Neutral power (W) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the power, in watt units, between L1 and Neutral. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1-Neutral measurement.
The Line 2 to Neutral power (W) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the power, in watt units, between L2 and Neutral. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2-Neutral measurement.
The Line 3 to Neutral power (W) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the power, in watt units, between L3 and Neutral. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `Power`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3-Neutral measurement.
The energy sensors for this power supply.
This type shall contain properties that describe energy sensor readings for a power supply.
The Line 1 to Line 2 energy (kWh) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the energy, in kilowatt-hour units, between L1 and L2. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1-L2 measurement.
The Line 2 to Line 3 energy (kWh) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the energy, in kilowatt-hour units, between L2 and L3. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2-L3 measurement.
The Line 3 to Line 1 energy (kWh) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the energy, in kilowatt-hour units, between L3 and L1. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3-L1 measurement.
The Line 1 to Neutral energy (kWh) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the energy, in kilowatt-hour units, between L1 and Neutral. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L1-Neutral measurement.
The Line 2 to Neutral energy (kWh) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the energy, in kilowatt-hour units, between L2 and Neutral. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L2-Neutral measurement.
The Line 3 to Neutral energy (kWh) for this power supply.

This property shall contain the energy, in kilowatt-hour units, between L3 and Neutral. The value of the `DataSourceUri` property, if present, shall reference a resource of type `Sensor` with the `ReadingType` property containing the value `EnergykWh`. This property shall not be present if the equipment does not include an L3-Neutral measurement.
